permissions.description: Allows the app to get your approximate location. This location is derived by location services using network location sources such as cell towers and Wi-Fi. These location services must be turned on and available to your device for the app to use them. Apps may use this to determine approximately where you are.
permissions.name: approximate location (network-based)

permissions.description: Allows the app to view information about network connections such as which networks exist and are connected.
permissions.name: view network connections

permissions.description: Allows the app to view the configuration of Bluetooth on the device, and to make and accept connections with paired devices.
permissions.name: pair with Bluetooth devices

permissions.description: Allows the app to configure the local Bluetooth device, and to discover and pair with remote devices.
permissions.name: access Bluetooth settings

permissions.description: Allows the app to call phone numbers without your intervention. This may result in unexpected charges or calls. Note that this doesn't allow the app to call emergency numbers. Malicious apps may cost you money by making calls without your confirmation.
permissions.name: directly call phone numbers

permissions.description: Allows the app to get the list of accounts known by the device. This may include any accounts created by applications you have installed.
permissions.name: find accounts on the device

permissions.description: Allows the app to get the list of accounts known by the device. This may include any accounts created by applications you have installed.
permissions.name: find accounts on the device

permissions.description: Allows the app to retrieve its code, data, and cache sizes
permissions.name: measure app storage space

permissions.description: Allows the app to create network sockets and use custom network protocols. The browser and other applications provide means to send data to the internet, so this permission is not required to send data to the internet.
permissions.name: full network access

permissions.description: Allows the app to perform operations like adding and removing accounts, and deleting their password.
permissions.name: add or remove accounts

permissions.description: Allows the app to perform operations like adding and removing accounts, and deleting their password.
permissions.name: add or remove accounts

permissions.description: Allows the app to read all calendar events stored on your device, including those of friends or co-workers. This may allow the app to share or save your calendar data, regardless of confidentiality or sensitivity.
permissions.name: read calendar events plus confidential information

permissions.description: Allows the app to read data about your contacts stored on your device, including the frequency with which you've called, emailed, or communicated in other ways with specific individuals. This permission allows apps to save your contact data, and malicious apps may share contact data without your knowledge.
permissions.name: read your contacts

permissions.description: Allows the app to read the contents of your USB storage.
permissions.name: read the contents of your USB storage

permissions.description: Allows the app to read the sync settings for an account. For example, this can determine whether the People app is synced with an account.
permissions.name: read sync settings

permissions.description: Allows an app to read the sync stats for an account, including the history of sync events and how much data is synced.
permissions.name: read sync statistics

permissions.description: Allows the app to have itself started as soon as the system has finished booting. This can make it take longer to start the device and allow the app to slow down the overall device by always running.
permissions.name: run at startup

permissions.description: Allows the app to get details about the currently synced feeds.
permissions.name: read subscribed feeds

permissions.description: Allows the app to modify your currently synced feeds. Malicious apps may change your synced feeds.
permissions.name: write subscribed feeds

permissions.description: Allows the app to request authentication tokens.
permissions.name: use accounts on the device

permissions.description: Allows the app to control the vibrator.
permissions.name: control vibration

permissions.description: Allows the app to prevent the device from going to sleep.
permissions.name: prevent device from sleeping

permissions.description: Allows the app to add, remove, change events that you can modify on your device, including those of friends or co-workers. This may allow the app to send messages that appear to come from calendar owners, or modify events without the owners' knowledge.
permissions.name: add or modify calendar events and send email to guests without owners' knowledge

permissions.description: Allows the app to write to the USB storage.
permissions.name: modify or delete the contents of your USB storage

permissions.description: Allows an app to modify the sync settings for an account. For example, this can be used to enable sync of the People app with an account.
permissions.name: toggle sync on and off

permissions.description: Allows apps to accept cloud to device messages sent by the app's service. Using this service will incur data usage. Malicious apps could cause excess data usage.
permissions.name: receive data from Internet

permissions.description: Allows apps to see the usernames (email addresses) of the Google account(s) you have configured.
permissions.name: view configured accounts

permissions.description: Allows apps to sign in to Google mail services using the account(s) stored on this Android device.
permissions.name: Google mail

permissions.description: Allows this app to read Google service configuration data.
permissions.name: read Google service configuration
